title: Bug 16822: Search results should be removed when cu is moved
OB: When the customer (cu) is moved, the search results are not being cleared from the screen.
EB: Search results should be automatically cleared from the screen when the customer is moved.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Perform a search in the application.
2. See the search results on the screen.
3. Move the customer to a different location or category.
4. Check if the search results are still displayed on the screen after the customer is moved.
